name: Imperial Stout
description: Pours jet-black with a tan head. Intense roasted malt character. Complex dark fruit flavors carry through bittersweet layers of coffee, chocolate, and rich toffee whilst the full-bodied, rich texture is balanced by big alcohol. Brewed with Pale malt, roasted barley, chocolate malt, flaked barley, black malt, Special B malt, peated malt, Munich malt, and white wheat.
